author: smuzaffar
body:
Following the suggested https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34761#pullrequestreview-723838671, this PR moves all the `.h and .cc` files used only by plugin in to plugins directory. Cleans up the BuildFile and fixes the python warnings
```
src/CalibMuon/DTCalibration/python/PlottingTools/plotT0FromHistos.py:7: SyntaxWarning: "is" with a literal. Did you mean "=="?
  if sl is 3 and station is 4: return 11
src/CalibMuon/DTCalibration/python/PlottingTools/plotT0FromHistos.py:7: SyntaxWarning: "is" with a literal. Did you mean "=="?
  if sl is 3 and station is 4: return 11
src/CalibMuon/DTCalibration/python/PlottingTools/plotT0FromHistos.py:8: SyntaxWarning: "is" with a literal. Did you mean "=="?
  if sl is 2 and station is 4: return None
src/CalibMuon/DTCalibration/python/PlottingTools/plotT0FromHistos.py:8: SyntaxWarning: "is" with a literal. Did you mean "=="?
  if sl is 2 and station is 4: return None

```
title: [CalibMuon] Move and merge .h and .cc files used by plugin
